title: Podcast: New jobs at Companies House

content.text: In this podcast, Meg talks with Ruth Frost and Rebecca Strange who work in the recruitment team within our People Transformation directorate, and Si Robins, who’s Head of Agile Delivery within our Digital, Data and Technology (DDaT) directorate.
The DDaT directorate is recruiting, so tune in to find out if there's an opportunity to suit you.
We’re also recruiting for a number of other new roles at Companies House. See our latest vacancies on Civil Service Jobs and find out what it’s like to work at Companies House.
